JOB DESCRIPTION: Critical Experiences:      1. A release engineer should be someone with strong engineering and development background      2. S/he should have at least 7 years with minimum of 2 years as scrum master.   3. S/he should understand software build and delivery process with focus on automation of the same.  4. S/he should have effective communication skills and a strong hold over the release engineering practices to be able to drive the team and customer towards devops principles if required   Credentials:   A degree in Computer Science or equivalent - information technology, management information systems, software engineering and networking   Core competencies:   1. Python programming and designing - Expected Proficiency - Mastery  2. Django programming and designing - Expected Proficiency - Mastery   3. SQL programming - Expected Proficiency - Proficient   4. Builds Valuable Customer Relationships - Expected Proficiency - Proficient  5. Teaming Across Boundaries - Expected Proficiency - Mastery  6. Interacts with Respect - Expected Proficiency - Mastery  7. Displays Confidence and Curiosity - Expected Proficiency - Proficient  8. Demonstrates Excellence and Professionalism - Expected Proficiency - Mastery
